svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2023-09-05T16:05:16.079Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/14.6.13 Chrome/89.0.4389.128 Electron/12.0.7 Safari/537.36" etag="ZLqBlmutaC5q_uYPYaEP" version="14.6.13" type="device"><diagram id="j39BeKSZk83gd--y38wb" name="第 1 页"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 227px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 140px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
判断是否停止并获取下一个定时器的超时时间
当定时器没有任务而且没有要处理的事件时，idle协程退出

switch.text: 判断是否停止并获取下一个定时器的超时时间 当定时器没有任务而且没有要处理的事件时，idle协程退出

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 191px; height: 1px; padding-top: 270px; margin-left: 225px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 498px; height: 1px; padding-top: 380px; margin-left: 71px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: 处理超时定时器，执行回调函数；如果为循环定时器，则重新添加到定时器容器

switch.text: 处理超时定时器，执行回调函数；如果为循环定时器，则重新添加到定时器容器

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 520px; margin-left: 106px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: 获取事件上下文（在添加事件时，将fd_ctx作为data.ptr传入）

switch.text: 获取事件上下文（在添加事件时，将fd_ctx作为data.ptr传入）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 630px; margin-left: 106px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: 是否还有剩余未处理事件，有则op为修改事件，否则删除事件

switch.text: 是否还有剩余未处理事件，有则op为修改事件，否则删除事件

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 740px; margin-left: 106px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: 触发读写事件，设置事件计数，重置事件上下文

switch.text: 触发读写事件，设置事件计数，重置事件上下文

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 860px; margin-left: 106px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: 将当前协程swapOut(),将控制权还给主协程

switch.text: 将当前协程swapOut(),将控制权还给主协程
